# Hi, I'm Arvind Venkatadri.

I'm external Faculty at the [Srishti Manipal Institute of Art and Design](https://srishtimanipalinstitute.in), both in Bangalore, INDIA, and a [Certified Level #1 TRIZ Professional](https://www.matriz-official.net) . 

I have a passion for coding in R / ObservableJS / p5.js, 
Data Visualization, Complexity Science, Literature, and Creative
Thinking / Problem Solving with TRIZ. On this website, I share and teach
what I learned about TRIZ, a Russian System for Structured, Inventive Problem Solving. I am a Level#1 Certified TRIZ Professional from MATRIZ, the International TRIZ Association.

To get started, you can check out [my courses](./content/courses/listing.qmd). You can also find me on
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/arvind_v), 
[GitHub](https://github.com/arvindvenkatadri), and on [Medium](https://medium.com/@arvind.venkatadri). Feel free to
reach out to me via [email](mailto:arvind.venkatadri@gmail.com) !
